name: Magic Peacock
descriptionShort: Magnificent peacock-inspired fireworks with vibrant, cascading colors that mesmerize crowds.
descriptionLong: Experience the Magic Peacock collection - a premium fireworks display inspired by the majestic peacock. Features stunning color combinations and spectacular visual effects that light up the sky.
